column1: Kata Robata////This place is sooooo delish. Everything I had tasted great. The foie gras nigiri was my favorite. It was so creamy with the right amount of sweetness. Also
column2: the black sesame creme brule was something I've never tasted before. I definitely love the creative combination. Thumbs up! No complaints here except that the place was sort of noisy
column3: but I guess it's because this place is doing well for itself. The place was super packed for a week-day night. Will definitely return for some more goodness! =)
